text: Kingstown is the capital city of Saint Vincent and the Grenadines. The population of Kingstown as of 2008 is 24,518. Kingstown exports bananas, coconuts, and arrowroot. Kingstown was started as a settlement by the French a little after 1722. The botanical garden in Kingstown is one of the oldest ones in the Western Hemisphere.http://www.bgci.org/garden.php?id=314 == References == Category:National capitals in North America Category:Geography of Saint Vincent and the Grenadines
title: Kingstown
